Name: Brain bases for navigating acoustic features - fMRI dataset
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the dataset and the original paper (as of 7 May 2025 this is the preprint: https://doi.org/10.1101/2025.02.10.636597)

GeneratedBy.Name: ezBIDS
GeneratedBy.Description: ezBIDS is a web-based tool for converting neuroimaging datasets to BIDS, requiring neither coding nor knowledge of the BIDS specification
